author: leosimons
msg: include the build scripts in the source distribution. This allows you to download the source distribution and type "ant dist" to generate the binary distribution.

author: bloritsch
msg: fix license violations--ASF requires full ASL in source code

author: bloritsch
msg: make Informix strictly a runtime dependency.  Requires ugly reflection to do the work, but hey it is better than requiring a third party commercial jar to get a full distro
